table.name: vtiger_cbcredentials
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbcredentials` ( `cbcredentialsid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cbcredentialsno` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `adapter` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `azure_account` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `azure_key` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `azure_container` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_clientid` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_project_id` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_bucket` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_client_secret` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_developer_key` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_application_name` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_refresh_token` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `google_scopes` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ftp_host` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ftp_path` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ftp_password` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ftp_username` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ftp_port` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `opencloud_username` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `opencloud_password` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `opencloud_projectname` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbcredentialsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbcredentialscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbcredentialscf` ( `cbcredentialsid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbcredentialsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
